name: m-
description: Mdash is a design system based on web standards. It's extremely small (see comparison chart), fast, simple, and compatible with any JavaScript framework.

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext css --exec npm run build
scripts.build: rm -r dist; mkdir dist && npm run css && npm run icons && cp -R dist/** docs
scripts.release: git pull && git commit -a -m "Released new version: $VERSION" && git push --tags origin master
